question:
Consider the following statements about the Motion of Thanks on the President’s Address:
  1. The discussion on Motion of Thanks is initiated by the proposer of the Motion followed by the seconder who are selected by the Prime Minister
  2. If an amendment to the President’s Address is passed in the Lok Sabha, the government has to resign
   Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is correct because members who are to move and second the Motion are selected by the Prime Minister and the notice of such a motion is received through the Ministry of Parliamentary Affairs. Second statement is also correct. There have already been four instances so far, when the Motion of Thanks was adopted by Rajya Sabha with 7 8 amendments. The Motion of Thanks with an amendment was adopted for the first time on 30 January 1980. On 29 December 1989, the Motion of Thanks was adopted with six amendments. Again on 12 March 2001, the Motion of Thanks was adopted with an amendment.
